title: loved, lost and learned
description: loved, lost and learned is the debut collection of poetry from haroon tahir. it encapsulates all those beautiful and ugly moments that we can never quite let go of. from the simple joys of your first love to the deep pitfalls of heartache and the complicated world of mental health, self-love, masculinity and immigrant life, tahirâ€™s book navigates our vividly complex universe with striking simplicity and honesty.
author: Haroon Tahir
